content:
This introductory course on Sports Psychology is packaged covering the key elements vital for sports and performance. Targeted for athletes, coaches, trainers, support staff etc, it orients participants to sports psychology , the careers opportunities , how to be in performance zone and apply psychological skills for performance. equips and ensures that one can unleash their potential. which can be capitalized on to enhance sports performance. To deliver this course, we have resource persons who come with a wide array of experience and background in the sports industry as well as academics.

INTENDED AUDIENCE: Overall, the course caters to a wide range of individuals involved in sports and fitness, providing them with essential knowledge and practical skills to enhance performance, monitor training loads, and promote effective recovery strategies. They include but not limited to Athletes, Coaches, Strength & Conditioning Specialist, Sports Science Professionals, Physiotherapist, etc.

PREREQUISITES: 10 +2

INDUSTRY SUPPORT: Sports Authority of India, National Federations & their Affiliated State Associations, Various Clubs, Khelo India Academies, Private Academies, etc.
